title: [Anatomy of the hand] (D)
brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm showing the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of the hand and its individual fingers. Presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
description: Dissection of a human hand and arm showing the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of the hand and its individual fingers. Presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
